survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to understand their experiences, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most commonly use?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear definitions or tooltips for charging levels if needed.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most commonly use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider randomizing options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an EV charging station? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see at EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see at EV charging stations?
